name: quick-guard
effect: Moves with priority greater than 0 will not hit friendly Pokémon for the remainder of this turn. If the user is last to act this turn, this move will fail. This move cannot be selected by assist or metronome.
short_effect: Prevents any priority moves from hitting friendly Pokémon this turn.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user protects itself and its allies from priority moves.
